title: Recommended blogs?
content:
joannejacobs.com   
andrewsullivan.com   
tonguetied.us   
   
drudgereport.com   
memepool.com   
fark.com   
macosrumors.com   
   
and of course theonion.com
author: johnbutler

comments.content:
I read [www.dooce.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.dooce.com/) whenever I remember it. She's hilarious.   
   
And I've recently found�and this is hilarious too and probably very offensive to some people soooo...� [http://tardblog.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/tardblog.com/)

Here are a few: [http://www.movabletype.org/donors.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.movabletype.org/donors.shtml)   
   
Just scroll down the list and pick one at random. That's how I discovered [Todd Dominey's blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.whatdoiknow.org/), one of my favorites.
If you do a Google search for **blog pda version** you'll get a list of blogs with versions formatted for Palm and other small screen devices.

Here's a few of my favourites (for various reasons):   
   
 [http://www.brushstroke.tv/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.brushstroke.tv/)   
 [http://www.dangerousmeta.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.dangerousmeta.com/)   
 [http://www.daringfireball.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.daringfireball.net/)   
 [http://www.notmydog.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.notmydog.com/)   
 [http://www.simplebits.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.simplebits.com/)   
 [http://www.stevenf.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.stevenf.com/)   
 [http://www.web-graphics.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516140844/http:/www.web-graphics.com/)
